physical_appearance:The image shows a photograph in black-and-white. It is rectangular and it features a group of military personnel. All of them are males and they are wearing uniform
 which consists of a beret
 long sleeved shirt and pants. All of them are looking in the direction where the photograph was captured. There are four rows of military personnel
 with the first two sitting down and the last two standing up. The background of the photograph shows a building with two sets of windows
 The windows contain grilles and curtains can be seen on the other side.

metadata.title_text: Group of Military Personnel Photography Album (donation from Anthony Robert Saint Claire)
metadata.physical_appearance: The image shows a photograph in black-and-white. It is rectangular and it features a group of military personnel. All of them are males and they are wearing uniform, which consists of a beret, long sleeved shirt and pants. All of them are looking in the direction where the photograph was captured. There are four rows of military personnel, with the first two sitting down and the last two standing up. The background of the photograph shows a building with two sets of windows, The windows contain grilles and curtains can be seen on the other side.
